----- Original Message -----
From: "Chris Croome" <chris@...>
To: <rest-discuss@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 26, 2003 6:48 AM
Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] W3C Note - User Agent Authentication FORM
elements


> Hi
>
> On Wed 26-Feb-2003 at 11:40:22AM +0000, Nic Ferrier wrote:
> >
> > It's a long time since I dealt with basic auth... but I thought it
> > was possible to send the UNAUTHORIZED response to log the user out
> > and then have the user log in again with another username and
> > password.
>
> In my experience it doesn't work like that :-(

It certainly can work like that, provided you build the part needed
on the server.  But it's a logout followed immediately by another
login, which I'm not sure is the requirement here.

WM
